== Introduction ==

Welcome to Ubuntu LoCo Gujarat Wiki page.

== Aim ==
This team is created with the aim of spreading Knowledge of the Linux all over gujarat through medium of Ubuntu operating system.

== Motto of the team ==

==== ""We believe in Free,to be Free and to make free"" ====

== Future Hopes ==

* Try to spread ubuntu in Gujarat region.
* Try to aware people about FOSS in Gujarat region.
